title: Jessica Simpson beams while holding her six-month-old daughter Birdie Mae in sweet Instagram snap
text:
She gave birth to her third child, Birdie Mae, less than seven months ago on March 19.

And Jessica Simpson, 39, has already lost an astounding 100 pounds after the birth of her daughter when she 'tipped the scales at 240.'

The mother of three took to Instagram on Sunday to share a sweet picture of her baby girl, captioning the post, 'We just get each other [heart eyes emoji] #BIRDIEMAE.'

Jessica Simpson, 39, took to Instagram on Sunday to share a sweet picture of her 6-month-old baby girl, Birdie, captioning the post, 'We just get each other [heart eyes emoji] #BIRDIEMAE'

In the photo, Simpson can be seen holding Birdie while wearing a matching set of animal print sweats.

The With You singer swept her blonde locks up into a messy bun as her bangs hung loosely over her forehead.

Six-month-old Birdie donned a pink, footed onesie that had ruffles at her seat.

Simpson looks fresh-faced in the photo as she and Birdie smile at the camera.

Proud mom: The star also posted a black and white selfie last Monday with daughter Maxwell, 7, who was holding baby Birdie (posted September 30)

The star also posted a black and white selfie tn Monday with daughter Maxwell, 7, who was holding baby Birdie.

'Nothing makes me happier than coming home to this,' The Dukes of Hazard star wrote in the caption.

The singer shares her daughters and son Ace, six with husband Eric Johnson, 40.

The couple wed in 2014, the second marriage for both of them.

Family: Simpson shares her daughters and son Ace, six with husband Eric Johnson who recently celebrated his 40th birthday

Simpson was formerly married to 98 Degrees member Nick Lachey from 2002 to 2006.

And former NFL pro Johnson was previously married to teacher Keri D'Angelo from 2005 to 2010.

Simpson has been making headlines as of late with her stunning 100 pound post-pregnancy weight loss.

Slim: Jessica has been making headlines with her stunning post-pregnancy weight loss. A week ago, she posted to Instagram confirming she'd dropped 100 pounds in just six months

Two weeks ago, she shared a photo to Instagram showing off her fabulous figure and confirming she'd dropped 100 pounds in just six months.

'[S]o proud to feel like myself again. Even when it felt impossible, I chose to work harder,' she wrote to her 4.9 million followers on Instagram.

The Where You Are hitmaker credited her weight loss to lots of exercise as well as a diet change that involved eating lots of cauliflower.
description: She gave birth to her third child, Birdie Mae, less than seven months ago. And Jessica  has already lost an astounding 100 pounds after the birth of her daughter when she 'tipped the scales at 240.'
